sentence.text: In the present study, we evaluated the association of SENPs polymorphism with susceptibility as well as clinicopathologic features and patients' response of breast cancer (BC) in a Chinese population.We genotyped SENP1 (rs61918808), SENP2 (rs6762208), SENP7 (rs61697963) by sequencing in a case-control study including 210 BC patients and 225 healthy volunteers.
